question: How does the variant ABL1 R351W affect response to Imatinib in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ABL1 R351W'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Aspirin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Aspirin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Aspirin')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'RET C618R'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selpercatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selpercatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selpercatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Does EML4 EML4::ALK Fusion AND ALK F1174C predict response to Crizotinib in Malignant Tumor?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EML4 EML4::ALK Fusion AND ALK F1174C'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'

RETURN

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('R3Mab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('R3Mab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('R3Mab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'multiple' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Infigratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Infigratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Infigratinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'transitional' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EGFR L861'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What is the effect of BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 F359I on Imatinib Mesylate in Myeloid Leukemia, Chronic?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 F359I'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trametinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trametinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Ponatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ponatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ponatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
